methodology: Analysis of elite RB seasons (22+ fantasy points per game) from 2019-2024

key_findings.age_cliff_evidence: 92.1% of elite RB seasons come from players under 29
key_findings.sharp_decline: Production cliff is steep, not gradual

dynasty_implications.risk_assessment: Age 29+ RBs are high-risk, low-probability plays

practical_applications.cmc_analysis: Age 29 in 2025 = high risk despite elite talent
practical_applications.saquon_barkley: Age 28 in 2025 = final elite season likely
practical_applications.general_rule: Treat age 29+ as rental assets only

community_guidelines.contending_teams: Can justify age 29+ RBs for championship pushes
community_guidelines.trading_strategy: Sell elite RBs before age cliff, not after
community_guidelines.evaluation_framework: Age should heavily weight RB dynasty rankings

statistical_confidence.consistency: Findings consistent across all seasons analyzed
